articles.title: The World’s Biggest Bitcoin Mine Is Rattling This Texas Oil Town
articles.description: A cash-strapped city in rural Texas will soon be home to the world’s largest bitcoin mine. Local protesters are “raising hell.”

articles.title: Crypto Bro Charters Private SpaceX Mission to Earth’s Poles
articles.description: Fram2 could fly as early as this year, marking SpaceX's seventh private crew of astronauts.
articles.content:
